alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 10:59PM EDT until May 17 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BERTIE...EASTERN NORTHAMPTON...HERTFORD AND NORTHWESTERN GATES COUNTIES... At 1059 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Conway to near Woodland to near Scotland Neck, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Woodland around 1105 PM EDT. Murfreesboro and Chowan University around 1110 PM EDT. Ahoskie and Como around 1115 PM EDT. Aulander, Winton and Cofield around 1120 PM EDT. Roduco around 1125 PM EDT. Powellsville around 1130 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Tunis, Kelford, Earleys, Menola, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton and Dort. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
